name: Commando Battle War
description:
Let’s face this furious battle challenge, you will play as a modern sniper to strike terrorists where you have to fight on your own solely as an army special force sniper shooter.

Features:
- Best First Person Shooting (FPS) game
- Exciting shooting war environment
- Real life 3D commando sniper shooting
- Highly addictive game play
- Attractive GUI with easy controls
- Unique 3D stunning graphics
- Excellent realistic 3D Battlefield environment
